channel.title: [Tutorial] Runecrafting
channel.description:
Alright I looked over forums and found no sign of runecraft (except in a source) so I thought I'd post it :D This is pretty much the same as ProjectP2P so if you're looking for one extreamly close to RuneScape 2, I can't help you. I have only tested in EasyRSC (Noobscape) so you might have to change a few things for anything other.
So first if you don't already have Rune Essence added to your items.xml your going to need to add it. [Code] <ItemDef> <name>Rune Essence</name> <description>Used for runecrafting</description> <command></command> <sprite>36</sprite> <basePrice>1</basePrice> <stackable>false</stackable> <wieldable>false</wieldable> <pictureMask>0</pictureMask> </ItemDef>[/Code] If you have never added anything else the ID should be 1314.
Now to add the Runecrafting Altars. Find GameObjectDef.xml and add this to the end of it. There is also essence too :D [Code] <name>Rune Essence</name> <description>This stone seems to have some magical rune essence...</description> <command1>mine essence</command1> <command2>Examine</command2> <type>1</type> <width>1</width> <height>1</height> <groundItemVar>0</groundItemVar> <objectModel>gemrock</objectModel> </GameObjectDef> <GameObjectDef> <name>Air Altar</name> <description>A sort of ancient altar to craft runes.</description> <command1>WalkTo</command1> <command2>Examine</command2> <type>1</type> <width>2</width> <height>2</height> <groundItemVar>0</groundItemVar> <objectModel>dolmen</objectModel> </GameObjectDef> <GameObjectDef> <name>Mind Altar</name> <description>A sort of ancient altar to craft runes.</description> <command1>WalkTo</command1> <command2>Examine</command2> <type>1</type> <width>2</width> <height>2</height> <groundItemVar>0</groundItemVar> <objectModel>dolmen</objectModel> </GameObjectDef> <GameObjectDef> <name>Water Altar</name> <description>A sort of ancient altar to craft runes.</description> <command1>WalkTo</command1> <command2>Examine</command2> <type>1</type> <width>2</width> <height>2</height> <groundItemVar>0</groundItemVar> <objectModel>dolmen</objectModel> </GameObjectDef> <GameObjectDef> <name>Earth Altar</name> <description>A sort of ancient altar to craft runes.</description> <command1>WalkTo</command1> <command2>Examine</command2> <type>1</type> <width>2</width> <height>2</height> <groundItemVar>0</groundItemVar> <objectModel>dolmen</objectModel> </GameObjectDef> <GameObjectDef> <name>Fire Altar</name> <description>A sort of ancient altar to craft runes.</description> <command1>WalkTo</command1> <command2>Examine</command2> <type>1</type> <width>2</width> <height>2</height> <groundItemVar>0</groundItemVar> <objectModel>dolmen</objectModel> </GameObjectDef> <GameObjectDef> <name>Body Altar</name> <description>A sort of ancient altar to craft runes.</description> <command1>WalkTo</command1> <command2>Examine</command2> <type>1</type> <width>2</width> <height>2</height> <groundItemVar>0</groundItemVar> <objectModel>dolmen</objectModel> </GameObjectDef> <GameObjectDef> <name>Cosmic Altar</name> <description>A sort of ancient altar to craft runes.</description> <command1>WalkTo</command1> <command2>Examine</command2> <type>1</type> <width>2</width> <height>2</height> <groundItemVar>0</groundItemVar> <objectModel>dolmen</objectModel> </GameObjectDef> <GameObjectDef> <name>Chaos Altar</name> <description>A sort of ancient altar to craft runes.</description> <command1>WalkTo</command1> <command2>Examine</command2> <type>1</type> <width>2</width> <height>2</height> <groundItemVar>0</groundItemVar> <objectModel>dolmen</objectModel> </GameObjectDef> <GameObjectDef> <name>Nature Altar</name> <description>A sort of ancient altar to craft runes.</description> <command1>WalkTo</command1> <command2>Examine</command2> <type>1</type> <width>2</width> <height>2</height> <groundItemVar>0</groundItemVar> <objectModel>dolmen</objectModel> </GameObjectDef> <GameObjectDef> <name>Law Altar</name> <description>A sort of ancient altar to craft runes.</description> <command1>WalkTo</command1> <command2>Examine</command2> <type>1</type> <width>2</width> <height>2</height> <groundItemVar>0</groundItemVar> <objectModel>dolmen</objectModel> </GameObjectDef> <GameObjectDef> <name>Death Altar</name> <description>A sort of ancient altar to craft runes.</description> <command1>WalkTo</command1> <command2>Examine</command2> <type>1</type> <width>2</width> <height>2</height> <groundItemVar>0</groundItemVar> <objectModel>dolmen</objectModel> </GameObjectDef> <GameObjectDef> <name>Blood Altar</name> <description>A sort of ancient altar to craft runes.</description> <command1>WalkTo</command1> <command2>Examine</command2> <type>1</type> <width>2</width> <height>2</height> <groundItemVar>0</groundItemVar> <objectModel>dolmen</objectModel> </GameObjectDef> <GameObjectDef> <name>Soul Altar</name> <description>A sort of ancient altar to craft runes.</description> <command1>WalkTo</command1> <command2>Examine</command2> <type>1</type> <width>2</width> <height>2</height> <groundItemVar>0</groundItemVar> <objectModel>dolmen</objectModel> </GameObjectDef>[/code]
Alright so now that you have all the objects and items needed we must move into the src. Replace the old ObjectAction.java with this one: http://uppit.com/v/60H9HDFB That Object Action has "mine essence" and the two runecrafting portals added to it.

item.title: [Tutorial] Runecrafting
item.dc:creator: @Shadowsoul Shadowsoul
item.description:
@Shadowsoul wrote:

Continued from last post:

[code]
switch(object.getID()) {
case 1207: // Nature Altar
if(item.getID() != 1314) { //If the used item is not essence
owner.getActionSender().sendMessage(“Nothing interesting happens.”);
return;
}

 				if(object.getX() == 349 && object.getY() == 815)	{
 					if(owner.getCurStat(16) < 45){
 						owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need at least 45 runecrafting to craft nature-runes"); //Can't make runes
 					}else
 					{
      				owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You start to craft some runes");
					GameObject objectC = new GameObject(Point.location(owner.getX(), owner.getY()), 1142, 0, 0); 		
					world.registerGameObject(objectC); 
					world.delayedRemoveObject(objectC, 2500); 
					
					world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {

					public void action() { 		
							int expi, k;
							expi = 9;
							k = 0;
		                 while(owner.getInventory().contains(item)) 
		                 {
		                    owner.getInventory().remove(item); // Remove 1 essence
		                    k++; //Count 1 more
		                 }
		                 if(owner.getCurStat(16) > 91)
		                 {
		                	 k = k * 4; //Quad the amount of runes
		                 }
		                expi = k * expi;
		                owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(40, k));
						owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You have successfully crafted " + k + " nature-runes.");
						owner.setBusy(false);
						owner.incExp(16, expi, false, false);
						owner.getActionSender().sendInventory();
						owner.getActionSender().sendStat(16);
						k = 0;
						}
					});
				}
			}
		}			
		
		switch(object.getID()) {
		case 1208: // Law Altar
  				if(item.getID() != 1314) { //If the used item is not essence
  					owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("Nothing interesting happens.");
  					return;
  				}
			
 				if(object.getX() == 404 && object.getY() == 537)	{
 					if(owner.getCurStat(16) < 55){
 						owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need at least 55 runecrafting to craft law-runes"); //Can't make runes
 					}else
 					{
      				owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You start to craft some runes");
					GameObject objectC = new GameObject(Point.location(owner.getX(), owner.getY()), 1031, 0, 0); 		
					world.registerGameObject(objectC); 
					world.delayedRemoveObject(objectC, 2500); 
					
					world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {

					public void action() { 		
							int expk, m;
							expk = 13;
							m = 0;
		                 while(owner.getInventory().contains(item)) 
		                 {
		                    owner.getInventory().remove(item); // Remove 1 essence
		                    m++; //Count 1 more
		                 }
		                 if(owner.getCurStat(16) > 98)
		                 {
		                	 m = m * 4; //Quad the amount of runes
		                 }
		                expk = m * expk;
		                owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(42, m));
						owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You have successfully crafted " + m + " law-runes.");
						owner.setBusy(false);
						owner.incExp(16, expk, false, false);
						owner.getActionSender().sendInventory();
						owner.getActionSender().sendStat(16);
						m = 0;
						}
					});
				}
			}
		}	
		
		
		switch(object.getID()) {
		case 1209: // Death Altar
  				if(item.getID() != 1314) { //If the used item is not essence
  					owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("Nothing interesting happens.");
  					return;
  				}
			
 				if(object.getX() == 91 && object.getY() == 3301)	{
 					if(owner.getCurStat(16) < 65){
 						owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need at least 65 runecrafting to craft death-runes"); //Can't make runes
 					}else
 					{
      				owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You start to craft some runes");
					GameObject objectC = new GameObject(Point.location(owner.getX(), owner.getY()), 1036, 0, 0); 		
					world.registerGameObject(objectC); 
					world.delayedRemoveObject(objectC, 2500); 
					
					world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {

					public void action() { 		
							int expm, n;
							expm = 15;
							n = 0;
		                 while(owner.getInventory().contains(item)) 
		                 {
		                    owner.getInventory().remove(item); // Remove 1 essence
		                    n++; //Count 1 more
		                 }
		                 if(owner.getCurStat(16) > 98)
		                 {
		                	 n = n * 3; //Triple the amount of runes
		                 }
		                expm = n * expm;
		                owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(38, n));
						owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You have successfully crafted " + n + " death-runes.");
						owner.setBusy(false);
						owner.incExp(16, expm, false, false);
						owner.getActionSender().sendInventory();
						owner.getActionSender().sendStat(16);
						n = 0;
						}
					});
				}
			}
		}	
		
		switch(object.getID()) {
		case 1210: // Blood Altar
  				if(item.getID() != 1314) { //If the used item is not essence
  					owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("Nothing interesting happens.");
  					return;
  				}
			
 				if(object.getX() == 242 && object.getY() == 226)	{
 					if(owner.getCurStat(16) < 77){
 						owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need at least 77 runecrafting to craft blood-runes"); //Can't make runes
 					}else
 					{
      				owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You start to craft some runes");
					GameObject objectC = new GameObject(Point.location(owner.getX(), owner.getY()), 1142, 0, 0); 		
					world.registerGameObject(objectC); 
					world.delayedRemoveObject(objectC, 2500); 
					
					world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {

					public void action() { 		
							int expn, o;
							expn = 17;
							o = 0;
		                 while(owner.getInventory().contains(item)) 
		                 {
		                    owner.getInventory().remove(item); // Remove 1 essence
		                    o++; //Count 1 more
		                 }
		                 if(owner.getCurStat(16) > 98)
		                 {
		                	 o = o * 3; //Triple the amount of runes
		                 }
		                expn = o * expn;
		                owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(619, o));
						owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You have successfully crafted " + o + " blood-runes.");
						owner.setBusy(false);
						owner.incExp(16, expn, false, false);
						owner.getActionSender().sendInventory();
						owner.getActionSender().sendStat(16);
						o = 0;
						}
					});
				}
			}
		}
		
		switch(object.getID()) {
		case 1211: // Soul Altar
  				if(item.getID() != 1314) { //If the used item is not essence
  					owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("Nothing interesting happens.");
  					return;
  				}
			
 				if(object.getX() == 618 && object.getY() == 731)	{
 					if(owner.getCurStat(16) < 80){
 						owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need at least 80 runecrafting to craft soul-runes"); //Can't make runes
 					}else
 					{
      				owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You start to craft some runes");
					GameObject objectC = new GameObject(Point.location(owner.getX(), owner.getY()), 1147, 0, 0); 		
					world.registerGameObject(objectC); 
					world.delayedRemoveObject(objectC, 2500); 
					
					world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {

					public void action() { 		
							int expo, p;
							expo = 20;
							p = 0;
		                 while(owner.getInventory().contains(item)) 
		                 {
		                    owner.getInventory().remove(item); // Remove 1 essence
		                    p++; //Count 1 more
		                 }
		                 if(owner.getCurStat(16) > 98)
		                 {
		                	 p = p * 3; //Triple the amount of runes
		                 }
		                expo = p * expo;
		                owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(825, p));
						owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You have successfully crafted " + p + " soul-runes.");
						owner.setBusy(false);
						owner.incExp(16, expo, false, false);
						owner.getActionSender().sendInventory();
						owner.getActionSender().sendStat(16);
						p = 0;
						}
					});
				}
			}
		}
		
	
			//~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~END RUNECRAFTING~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/code]

IDS you need to know:
Rune Essence Object ID - 1198
Rune Essence Item ID - 1314
Runecraft Altar IDs - 1199+
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 04, 2009, 05:49:37 pm[/size][hr]By the way if you want your client to say Runecraft where it says agility, look in mudclient and replace “Agility” with “Runecraft” and in Formulae (located in server) do the same. You need to place the altars in the correct location which I will reveal later. You could also just look at the code.

Read full topic

item.title: [Tutorial] Runecrafting
item.dc:creator: @Shadowsoul Shadowsoul
item.description:
@Shadowsoul wrote:

Now to finish off we must add the essence used on altars to InvUseOnObject.java. Look for [Code] private void handleObject(final Player player, final ActiveTile tile, final GameObject object, final InvItem item) { player.setStatus(Action.USING_INVITEM_ON_OBJECT); world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new WalkToObjectEvent(player, object, false) { public void arrived() { owner.resetPath(); if(owner.isBusy() || owner.isRanging() || !owner.getInventory().contains(item) || !owner.nextTo(object) || !tile.hasGameObject() || !tile.getGameObject().equals(object) || owner.getStatus() != Action.USING_INVITEM_ON_OBJECT) { return; } owner.resetAll();
Under that add [code]//~START RUNECRAFTING~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

		switch(object.getID()) {
  			case 1199: // Air Altar
  				if(item.getID() != 1314) { //If the used item is not essence
  					owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("Nothing interesting happens.");
  					return;
  				}

  				if(object.getX() == 302 && object.getY() == 594)	{ //Object locs
  					owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You start to craft some runes");
						GameObject object2 = new GameObject(Point.location(owner.getX(), owner.getY()), 1147, 0, 0); 		
						world.registerGameObject(object2);
						world.delayedRemoveObject(object2, 2500);
						
  						world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {

  						public void action() { 		

  								int expa, b;
  								expa = 1;
  								b = 0;
  			                 while(owner.getInventory().contains(item)) 
  			                 {
  			                    owner.getInventory().remove(item);
  			                    b++;
  			                 }
  			                 if(owner.getCurStat(16) > 11 && owner.getCurStat(16) <= 32)
  			                 {
  			                	 b = b * 2; //Double the amount of runes
  			                 }
  			                 else if(owner.getCurStat(16) > 33)
  			                 {
  			                	 b = b * 4; //Quadruple the amount of runes
  			                 }
  			                expa = b * expa;
  			                owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(33, b));
  							owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You have successfully crafted " + b + " air-runes.");
  							owner.incExp(16, expa, false, false);
  							owner.setBusy(false);
  							owner.getActionSender().sendInventory();
  							owner.getActionSender().sendStat(16);
  							b = 0;
  							}
  						});
  					}
					
					
  			case 1200: // Mind Altar
  				if(item.getID() != 1314) { //If the used item is not essence
  					owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("Nothing interesting happens.");
  					return;
  				}

 				if(object.getX() == 311 && object.getY() == 469)	{
 					if(owner.getCurStat(16) < 3){
 						owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need at least 3 runecrafting to craft mind-runes");
 					}else
 					{
      				owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You start to craft some runes");
					GameObject objectB = new GameObject(Point.location(owner.getX(), owner.getY()), 1147, 0, 0); 		
					world.registerGameObject(objectB);
					world.delayedRemoveObject(objectB, 2500);
					
					world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {

					public void action() { 		
							int expb, c;
							expb = 2;
							c = 0;
		                 while(owner.getInventory().contains(item)) 
		                 {
		                    owner.getInventory().remove(item);
		                    c++;
		                 }
		                 if(owner.getCurStat(16) > 14 && owner.getCurStat(16) <= 41)
		                 {
		                	 c = c * 2; //Double the amount of runes
		                 }
		                 else if(owner.getCurStat(16) > 42)
		                 {
		                	 c = c * 4; //Quadruple the amount of runes
		                 }
		                expb = c * expb;
		                owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(35, c));
						owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You have successfully crafted " + c + " mind-runes.");
						owner.setBusy(false);
						owner.incExp(16, expb, false, false);
						owner.getActionSender().sendInventory();
						owner.getActionSender().sendStat(16);
						c = 0;
						}
					});
				}
 			}
			
			
  			case 1201: // Water Altar
  				if(item.getID() != 1314) { //If the used item is not essence
  					owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("Nothing interesting happens.");
  					return;
  				}
			
 				if(object.getX() == 164 && object.getY() == 681)	{
 					if(owner.getCurStat(16) < 7){
 						owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need at least 7 runecrafting to craft water-runes"); //Can't make runes
 					}else
 					{
      				owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You start to craft some runes");
					GameObject objectC = new GameObject(Point.location(owner.getX(), owner.getY()), 1031, 0, 0); 		
					world.registerGameObject(objectC); 
					world.delayedRemoveObject(objectC, 2500); 
					
					world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {

					public void action() { 		
							int expc, d;
							expc = 3;
							d = 0;
		                 while(owner.getInventory().contains(item)) 
		                 {
		                    owner.getInventory().remove(item); // Remove 1 essence
		                    d++; //Count 1 more
		                 }
		                 if(owner.getCurStat(16) > 19 && owner.getCurStat(16) <= 56)
		                 {
		                	 d = d * 2; //Double the amount of runes
		                 }
		                 else if(owner.getCurStat(16) > 57)
		                 {
		                	 d = d * 4; //Quadruple the amount of runes
		                 }
		                expc = d * expc;
		                owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(32, d));
						owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You have successfully crafted " + d + " water-runes.");
						owner.setBusy(false);
						owner.incExp(16, expc, false, false);
						owner.getActionSender().sendInventory();
						owner.getActionSender().sendStat(16);
						d = 0;
						}
					});
				}
 			}
		}
		
		switch(object.getID()) {
		case 1202: // Earth Altar
  				if(item.getID() != 1314) { //If the used item is not essence
  					owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("Nothing interesting happens.");
  					return;
  				}
			
 				if(object.getX() == 81 && object.getY() == 474)	{
 					if(owner.getCurStat(16) < 10){
 						owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need at least 10 runecrafting to craft earth-runes"); //Can't make runes
 					}else
 					{
      				owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You start to craft some runes");
					GameObject objectC = new GameObject(Point.location(owner.getX(), owner.getY()), 1142, 0, 0); 		
					world.registerGameObject(objectC); 
					world.delayedRemoveObject(objectC, 2500); 
					
					world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {

					public void action() { 		
							int expd, e;
							expd = 3;
							e = 0;
		                 while(owner.getInventory().contains(item)) 
		                 {
		                    owner.getInventory().remove(item); // Remove 1 essence
		                    e++; //Count 1 more
		                 }
		                 if(owner.getCurStat(16) > 26 && owner.getCurStat(16) <= 69)
		                 {
		                	 e = e * 2; //Double the amount of runes
		                 }
		                 else if(owner.getCurStat(16) > 70)
		                 {
		                	 e = e * 4; //Quadruple the amount of runes
		                 }
		                expd = e * expd;
		                owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(34, e));
						owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You have successfully crafted " + e + " earth-runes.");
						owner.setBusy(false);
						owner.incExp(16, expd, false, false);
						owner.getActionSender().sendInventory();
						owner.getActionSender().sendStat(16);
						e = 0;
						}
					});
				}
			}
		}
		
		switch(object.getID()) {
		case 1203: // Fire Altar
  				if(item.getID() != 1314) { //If the used item is not essence
  					owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("Nothing interesting happens.");
  					return;
  				}
			
 				if(object.getX() == 52 && object.getY() == 634)	{
 					if(owner.getCurStat(16) < 15){
 						owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need at least 15 runecrafting to craft fire-runes"); //Can't make runes
 					}else
 					{
      				owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You start to craft some runes");
					GameObject objectC = new GameObject(Point.location(owner.getX(), owner.getY()), 1036, 0, 0); 		
					world.registerGameObject(objectC); 
					world.delayedRemoveObject(objectC, 2500); 
					
					world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {

					public void action() { 		
							int expe, f;
							expe = 4;
							f = 0;
		                 while(owner.getInventory().contains(item)) 
		                 {
		                    owner.getInventory().remove(item); // Remove 1 essence
		                    f++; //Count 1 more
		                 }
		                 if(owner.getCurStat(16) > 35 && owner.getCurStat(16) <= 77)
		                 {
		                	 f = f * 2; //Double the amount of runes
		                 }
		                 else if(owner.getCurStat(16) > 78)
		                 {
		                	 f = f * 4; //Quad the amount of runes
		                 }
		                expe = f * expe;
		                owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(31, f));
						owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You have successfully crafted " + f + " fire-runes.");
						owner.setBusy(false);
						owner.incExp(16, expe, false, false);
						owner.getActionSender().sendInventory();
						owner.getActionSender().sendStat(16);
						f = 0;
						}
					});
				}
			}
		}
		
		switch(object.getID()) {
		case 1204: // Body Altar
  				if(item.getID() != 1314) { //If the used item is not essence
  					owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("Nothing interesting happens.");
  					return;
  				}
			
 				if(object.getX() == 233 && object.getY() == 454)	{
 					if(owner.getCurStat(16) < 20){
 						owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need at least 20 runecrafting to craft body-runes"); //Can't make runes
 					}else
 					{
      				owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You start to craft some runes");
					GameObject objectC = new GameObject(Point.location(owner.getX(), owner.getY()), 1031, 0, 0); 		
					world.registerGameObject(objectC); 
					world.delayedRemoveObject(objectC, 2500); 
					
					world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {

					public void action() { 		
							int expf, g;
							expf = 5;
							g = 0;
		                 while(owner.getInventory().contains(item)) 
		                 {
		                    owner.getInventory().remove(item); // Remove 1 essence
		                    g++; //Count 1 more
		                 }
		                 if(owner.getCurStat(16) > 46 && owner.getCurStat(16) <= 91)
		                 {
		                	 g = g * 2; //Double the amount of runes
		                 }
		                 else if(owner.getCurStat(16) > 92)
		                 {
		                	 g = g * 4; //Quad the amount of runes
		                 }
		                expf = g * expf;
		                owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(36, g));
						owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You have successfully crafted " + g + " body-runes.");
						owner.setBusy(false);
						owner.incExp(16, expf, false, false);
						owner.getActionSender().sendInventory();
						owner.getActionSender().sendStat(16);
						g = 0;
						}
					});
				}
			}
		}
		
		switch(object.getID()) {
		case 1205: // Cosmic Altar
  				if(item.getID() != 1314) { //If the used item is not essence
  					owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("Nothing interesting happens.");
  					return;
  				}
			
 				if(object.getX() == 420 && object.getY() == 455)	{
 					if(owner.getCurStat(16) < 27){
 						owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need at least 27 runecrafting to craft cosmic-runes"); //Can't make runes
 					}else
 					{
      				owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You start to craft some runes");
					GameObject objectC = new GameObject(Point.location(owner.getX(), owner.getY()), 1147, 0, 0); 		
					world.registerGameObject(objectC); 
					world.delayedRemoveObject(objectC, 2500); 
					
					world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {

					public void action() { 		
							int expg, h;
							expg = 7;
							h = 0;
		                 while(owner.getInventory().contains(item)) 
		                 {
		                    owner.getInventory().remove(item); // Remove 1 essence
		                    h++; //Count 1 more
		                 }
		                 if(owner.getCurStat(16) > 59)
		                 {
		                	 h = h * 4; //Quad the amount of runes
		                 }
		                expg = h * expg;
		                owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(46, h));
						owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You have successfully crafted " + h + " cosmic-runes.");
						owner.setBusy(false);
						owner.incExp(16, expg, false, false);
						owner.getActionSender().sendInventory();
						owner.getActionSender().sendStat(16);
						h = 0;
						}
					});
				}
			}
		}
		
		switch(object.getID()) {
		case 1206: // Chaos Altar
  				if(item.getID() != 1314) { //If the used item is not essence
  					owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("Nothing interesting happens.");
  					return;
  				}
			
 				if(object.getX() == 233 && object.getY() == 376)	{
 					if(owner.getCurStat(16) < 35){
 						owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You need at least 35 runecrafting to craft chaos-runes"); //Can't make runes
 					}else
 					{
      				owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You start to craft some runes");
					GameObject objectC = new GameObject(Point.location(owner.getX(), owner.getY()), 1036, 0, 0); 		
					world.registerGameObject(objectC); 
					world.delayedRemoveObject(objectC, 2500); 
					
					world.getDelayedEventHandler().add(new ShortEvent(owner) {

					public void action() { 		
							int exph, i;
							exph = 8;
							i = 0;
		                 while(owner.getInventory().contains(item)) 
		                 {
		                    owner.getInventory().remove(item); // Remove 1 essence
		                    i++; //Count 1 more
		                 }
		                 if(owner.getCurStat(16) > 74)
		                 {
		                	 i = i * 4; //Quad the amount of runes
		                 }
		                exph = i * exph;
		                owner.getInventory().add(new InvItem(41, i));
						owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You have successfully crafted " + i + " chaos-runes.");
						owner.setBusy(false);
						owner.incExp(16, exph, false, false);
						owner.getActionSender().sendInventory();
						owner.getActionSender().sendStat(16);
						i = 0;
						}
					});
				}
			}
		}[/code][/code]

item.title: [Tutorial] Runecrafting
item.dc:creator: @Shadowsoul Shadowsoul
item.description:
@Shadowsoul wrote:

Alright I looked over forums and found no sign of runecraft (except in a source) so I thought I’d post it This is pretty much the same as ProjectP2P so if you’re looking for one extreamly close to RuneScape 2, I can’t help you. I have only tested in EasyRSC (Noobscape) so you might have to change a few things for anything other.

So first if you don’t already have Rune Essence added to your items.xml your going to need to add it.

<ItemDef> <name>Rune Essence</name> <description>Used for runecrafting</description> <command></command> <sprite>36</sprite> <basePrice>1</basePrice> <stackable>false</stackable> <wieldable>false</wieldable> <pictureMask>0</pictureMask> </ItemDef>
If you have never added anything else the ID should be 1314.

Now to add the Runecrafting Altars.
Find GameObjectDef.xml and add this to the end of it. There is also essence too

<name>Rune Essence</name> <description>This stone seems to have some magical rune essence...</description> <command1>mine essence</command1> <command2>Examine</command2> <type>1</type> <width>1</width> <height>1</height> <groundItemVar>0</groundItemVar> <objectModel>gemrock</objectModel> </GameObjectDef> <GameObjectDef> <name>Air Altar</name> <description>A sort of ancient altar to craft runes.</description> <command1>WalkTo</command1> <command2>Examine</command2> <type>1</type> <width>2</width> <height>2</height> <groundItemVar>0</groundItemVar> <objectModel>dolmen</objectModel> </GameObjectDef> <GameObjectDef> <name>Mind Altar</name> <description>A sort of ancient altar to craft runes.</description> <command1>WalkTo</command1> <command2>Examine</command2> <type>1</type> <width>2</width> <height>2</height> <groundItemVar>0</groundItemVar> <objectModel>dolmen</objectModel> </GameObjectDef> <GameObjectDef> <name>Water Altar</name> <description>A sort of ancient altar to craft runes.</description> <command1>WalkTo</command1> <command2>Examine</command2> <type>1</type> <width>2</width> <height>2</height> <groundItemVar>0</groundItemVar> <objectModel>dolmen</objectModel> </GameObjectDef> <GameObjectDef> <name>Earth Altar</name> <description>A sort of ancient altar to craft runes.</description> <command1>WalkTo</command1> <command2>Examine</command2> <type>1</type> <width>2</width> <height>2</height> <groundItemVar>0</groundItemVar> <objectModel>dolmen</objectModel> </GameObjectDef> <GameObjectDef> <name>Fire Altar</name> <description>A sort of ancient altar to craft runes.</description> <command1>WalkTo</command1> <command2>Examine</command2> <type>1</type> <width>2</width> <height>2</height> <groundItemVar>0</groundItemVar> <objectModel>dolmen</objectModel> </GameObjectDef> <GameObjectDef> <name>Body Altar</name> <description>A sort of ancient altar to craft runes.</description> <command1>WalkTo</command1> <command2>Examine</command2> <type>1</type> <width>2</width> <height>2</height> <groundItemVar>0</groundItemVar> <objectModel>dolmen</objectModel> </GameObjectDef> <GameObjectDef> <name>Cosmic Altar</name> <description>A sort of ancient altar to craft runes.</description> <command1>WalkTo</command1> <command2>Examine</command2> <type>1</type> <width>2</width> <height>2</height> <groundItemVar>0</groundItemVar> <objectModel>dolmen</objectModel> </GameObjectDef> <GameObjectDef> <name>Chaos Altar</name> <description>A sort of ancient altar to craft runes.</description> <command1>WalkTo</command1> <command2>Examine</command2> <type>1</type> <width>2</width> <height>2</height> <groundItemVar>0</groundItemVar> <objectModel>dolmen</objectModel> </GameObjectDef> <GameObjectDef> <name>Nature Altar</name> <description>A sort of ancient altar to craft runes.</description> <command1>WalkTo</command1> <command2>Examine</command2> <type>1</type> <width>2</width> <height>2</height> <groundItemVar>0</groundItemVar> <objectModel>dolmen</objectModel> </GameObjectDef> <GameObjectDef> <name>Law Altar</name> <description>A sort of ancient altar to craft runes.</description> <command1>WalkTo</command1> <command2>Examine</command2> <type>1</type> <width>2</width> <height>2</height> <groundItemVar>0</groundItemVar> <objectModel>dolmen</objectModel> </GameObjectDef> <GameObjectDef> <name>Death Altar</name> <description>A sort of ancient altar to craft runes.</description> <command1>WalkTo</command1> <command2>Examine</command2> <type>1</type> <width>2</width> <height>2</height> <groundItemVar>0</groundItemVar> <objectModel>dolmen</objectModel> </GameObjectDef> <GameObjectDef> <name>Blood Altar</name> <description>A sort of ancient altar to craft runes.</description> <command1>WalkTo</command1> <command2>Examine</command2> <type>1</type> <width>2</width> <height>2</height> <groundItemVar>0</groundItemVar> <objectModel>dolmen</objectModel> </GameObjectDef> <GameObjectDef> <name>Soul Altar</name> <description>A sort of ancient altar to craft runes.</description> <command1>WalkTo</command1> <command2>Examine</command2> <type>1</type> <width>2</width> <height>2</height> <groundItemVar>0</groundItemVar> <objectModel>dolmen</objectModel> </GameObjectDef>

Alright so now that you have all the objects and items needed we must move into the src. Replace the old ObjectAction.java with this one: http://uppit.com/v/60H9HDFB
That Object Action has “mine essence” and the two runecrafting portals added to it.

Read full topic
